original_text: So David hid himself in the field: and when the new moon was come, the king sat him down to eat meat.
korean_text: 다윗이 들에 숨으니라 초하루가 되매 왕이 앉아 음식을 먹을 때에

sentences.original_text: So David hid himself in the field
and when the new moon was come
the king sat him down to eat meat
sentences.korean_translation: 왕은 고기를 먹기 위해 그를 앉혔습니다
